Title: Object: La Madonna della Scodella
Description: Holy Family, after Correggio's Madonna della Scodella; the Virgin Mary sits on the ground in the bottom left, holding a bowl (scodella) in her right hand; the young Jesus is on Mary's lap, holding Joseph's right hand; Joseph, standing on the right, hands a branch of palm tree to angels hovering above among clouds; two further figures and a donkey visible in the background. 1778 Engraving, with some etching
Producer name: Print made by: Simon Jean François Ravenet
Curator's comments: The date given below the image 1529 is erroneous. See Mussini, 'Correggio Tradotto', 1995, p. 212.
Subjects: return of the holy family from egypt
Associated places: Associated with: Parma (city) (Church of St John the Evangelist)
Acquisition notes: From Richard Ford's collection of prints after Correggio (1837,0408.14 to 669), purchased from him through Colnaghi's, for £250.
